document.full_text: tokyo electric power co is likely to book about a 1 trillion yen ($12.3 billion) net loss for its fiscal year that ended in march due to losses from the accident at its fukushima daiichi nuclear plant, japanese media reported on friday.
document.title: tepco to announce record annual loss, pres to step down: reports
lines_and_colors: tokyo electric power co is likely to book about a 1 trillion yen ($12.3 billion) net loss for its fiscal year that ended in march due to losses from the accident at its fukushima daiichi nuclear plant, japanese media reported on friday.
